1.content:
You can't believe it, this is the fifth time that your dad got moved to a new city because of his work which meant your mother,sister & you had to go with him no exceptions (Cue forth wall destruction now.) "Oh excuse me, I didn't see you there. Oh, where are my manners! I'm Jackson, Jack for short. I'm the new kid in town. (forth wall repair now.) Your in your family's van with the rest of your family, you & your little sister Carla in the back & your parents in the front.

You let out a sigh as you look out the window at your new neighborhood,Carla notices your sudden mood change & asks "What's wrong Jack, Aren't you happy we'll be in our house soon?" She asks with worry filled eyes. You draw a heavy sigh as you look her dead in the eye & say "No dear sister I'm not. For one this is the fifth time we've had to move cause of dad's job, the FIFTH time! Not only did I have friends back home I had to leave my girlfriend." You take a few seconds to calm your nerves before your mom stops you from continuing and says "Not another word about that Jack, I know your upset. But hey,we're going to be living in the same neighborhood as Sonic & his friends, isn't that great!?"

You smile at this (at least this move won't be as bad as the last.) you think to yourself as the van comes to a stop in the driveway of your new house. You,Carla & your mom get out of the van along with all your things. Your father however stays in the van and says "You guys unpack I'll be home late." he says before speeding off to go and meet his new boss.

You look over at you house and think (House? More like Mansion.) before chuckling a bit at your thought as you head in to your house to begin unpacking the others fallowing right behind you. As the three of you begin unpacking your things the doorbell rings, which your mom answers it's one of your new neighbors it was...
1.title: The New kid in town

choices: Sorry, but Eggman is ATTACKING THE NEIGHBORHOOD
11.content: You said"OMG, it's Sonic the Hedgehog, the world's fastest thing alive, the blue bur, the hedgehog who eats chilli dogs, th-'' Sonic puts his hand on your shoulder and says to you" Chill out kid, I know that I am awesome but you don't need to exaggerate it. So nice to meet you Miss..." your mother says" Miss Jena" and he says'" Oh, nice to meet you Miss Jena, I am Sonic, Sonic the Hedgehog" she says"Nice to meet you too, this is my son who he seems to be a big fan of you and my daughter Carla,, who she is more of Amy's fangirl and she always want you and Amy to be together." Sonic says"Oookayyy, we will speak about that later, as I notice, you have a lot of unpacking to do, May I help you? cause I can finish it within a bleak of an eye!!" Your mother says sure and Sonic finish that in less than a minute and saying a well known catchphrase" Too easy, piece of cake" and speaking of that, you mother says to Sonic if he can stay here for dinner, Sonic says...

choices: We don't need any help but thank you though
12.content:
To your surprise the neighbor at your door turns out to be Tails,who of course has come to meet his new neighbors."Hi, you must be the new neighbors. I'm Miles Prower, but everyone calls me Tails." your mom giggles for a moment before she says "I can see why." pointing at his namesakes Tails chuckles a little at this, scratching the back of his neck in embarrassment.

Tails clears his throat for a second before saying "Anyway, it's nice to meet you Mrs..." he trails off not knowing her name, "Oh there's no need to be so formal. Just call me Jane." "Okay then, it's a pleasure to meet you Jane, and I must say that is a very pretty name."

She blushes at this saying "How kind of you." she says reaching out for a handshake which he kindly returns, "I see your getting on my mom's good side pretty quick, then again my mom always does that to people."

You say as you stand next to your mother. Jane mentally kicks herself before saying "Oh, I forgot! You haven't met my kids yet, This is my son, Jack." you bump fists with him saying "Nice to meet ya!" before your mom looks over her shoulder and says "Over there is my daughter, Carla." said girl looks up from the box she has in her arms and says "Hello." before continuing on with her task. "I would introduce you to my Husband, but he had to go and meet his new boss." Tails just nods his head in understanding before asking "Sense you're still unpacking could I help you guys out? I can help speed up the process and it would give us a little more time to talk & get to know each other better." Jane ponders this for a second before deciding...
12.title: Meeting the fox

choices: Ok, I will lend my parent to know about that
How about joining us in the dinner instead
You sister Carla appears out of nowhere and hugs Tails[Things will get intense]
121.content: You say "Of course you can Tails we'd appreciate the help.", Tails says"Great, Let's get start then!!!". As they almost finish the unpacking, you ask Tails out of curiosity why do they stay at this neighborhood, Tails replies" This neighborhood is our vacation place, me and my friends are always going here after we ruin Eggman's plans for world domination.Well, I live in the basement where my workshop is here so that I can invent new machines, while Sonic and Amy are living together in my home, while the others are living in their house, alongside with us so that we can meet each other every day!!! How about you My friend??". You said"Um, well it is the fifth time that I move in another neighborhood,cause My father found another job AGAIN, I miss all of my friends, especially my girlfriend, which she was the best girl that I ever met in my entire life, she was beautiful, smart and a sweet girl.We played a lot, had fun times and we liked to tickle our feet each other, I liked her feet, there were smooth like I was holding like a nice pillow,oops, sorry I got a little bit carried away.That is all for me Tails." Tails is kinda suprised and little bit of sad and he says"It is okay my friend, I am sure that you will see your girlfriend again so does your friends. In the meantime, after we done with the unpackage, do you want me to invite you to my home or do you want something else?" You say....
121.title: Sure we'd appreciate the help

1212.content:
This request catches Tails off guard for a sec before he says "You sure? I don't want to impose." as if on cue your mother butts in saying "Nonsense, Tails! it's no trouble at all." with a reassuring smile. "We owe you for helping us with our unpacking anyway, it's the least we can do." Tails responds to this with a shrug saying "If you guys have your minds made up then who am I to argue?" "Alright!" you & Carla exclaim simultaneously before heading over to the couch to try and find a movie to watch Tails fallowing close behind the two of you.

You eventually find one of your old faves Over The Hedge & stick it in the DVD player. As it's showing the previews you look over and notice Tails still has his shoes on which leads to you asking "Don't you want to take your shoes off and relax a bit man?" Carla then adds "Yeah take a load off, besides you feet are bound to be killing you after all the moving around we did today." Tails just says "You make a good point." before doing as you two had asked and takes off his shoes to let his feet breathe for awhile.

Meanwhile your mother finds herself in a pickle so to speak, she's trying to figure out what to do for dinner, sense she's a very good cook she can make something for everyone, or she can order take out from somewhere sense it's so late & your dad will be home soon.

(A/N whichever option you pick Jack's dad will come home to have dinner & ends up meeting Tails)
1212.title: "How about joining us in the dinner instead?"

12122.content:
Having made up her mind your mom goes to pick up the phone just as your dad opens the door, "Hi Honey how was your day?" Jane asks giving him a kiss on the cheek, "My day was fine, met my new boss turns out he's really nice.." He says as Jane helps him out of his coat, "That's great Jeff. Oh we've got company over for dinner tonight so I'm gonna order pizza. Do you want the usual?"

Jeff nods as Jane says "Alright then, go ahead and say hi to the kids and meet the new neighbor while I get this phoned in." With that Jane goes about ordering the pizza while Jeff does as his wife asked, "Hey kids I'm home!" Jeff says as Carla hugs him tightly, you do as well albeit not as enthusiastically as your sister. "You must be one of our new neighbors, Jeff nice to meet you." Your dad says holding out his hand for a handshake.

Tails returns the handshake as he introduces himself, "I'm Miles Prower but everybody I know calls me Tails." After that you all go about watching the movie up until the pizza arrived, eventually all of you have had your fill of the pizza and are just talking and getting to know each other until you ask "Hey Tails would you like to.."
12122.title: Pizza Party!

121221.content:
Tails was caught off guard, but nodded.

"Sure, if that's alright." Tails said.

"Of course it is, after all, you're our friend." Your mother said. Your sister agreed. You took him to your bedroom and got him a sleeping bag. When Tails got comfortable, he thanked you for letting him stay. You nodded and turned off the lights. Tails went to sleep very quickly, however, you stayed awake. For some reason, you just couldn't fall asleep, you assumed it was because you weren't used to your new home yet. You decided to just quietly watch Tails sleep, maybe it would help you get to sleep.

You kept watching him for a couple of hours, he looked so peaceful. Suddenly, your sister came in and sat on the bed next to you.

"Couldn't fall asleep either huh?" She asked. You nodded, you couldn't stop thinking about your old friends. Carla put her hand on your shoulder. "At least you made a new friend. I'm sure the two of you will go on lots of adventures." She said and left for her own room. You tried to go to sleep again, this time successful.

You dreamed that you and Tails were fighting Eggman. Tails said you didn't need Sonic, and that the two of you could beat Eggman alone. They two of you did a good job when you suddenly woke up. Tails wasn't there anymore. You went downstairs to find Tails . . .
121221.title: Tough night

1212212.content: You saw your mom and Tails watching tv and decided to....
1212212.title: Watching TV with mom

121222.content:
"Sure, what do you have in mind?" Tails asks. You take him to your bedroom and shut the door. The two of you sit down at your GameCube. Tails was surprised to see you had your own TV. You wanted to surprise him, so you told him to close his eyes. He nodded and kept them closed. Smiling, you put in the Sonic Mega Collection.

When you got to the main menu, you told your new friend to open his eyes. When he opened them, he was both surprised and very happy.

"Oh wow, I've always wanted to play this, but I never could get my hands on a copy." Tails said.

"I know it probably won't be as exciting as the real thing, but . . " you say.

"Well, it'll be nice to fight Eggman without any real danger, you know what I mean?" You nodded. Once you hand Tails the controller, he starts up the very first game. You had played this game for years, yet you still weren't very good. However, Tails seems to immediately be good at the game. During the whole time, he doesn't get hit once. You're simply amazed at how good he was.

"Ok, you had to have practice, there's no way this is your first time." You say.

"Seriously, I have never played the video game version. I guess it's because I got practice from the real action." He says, giggling. Within an hour, Tails beat the final boss.

"Wow, you're already better than me." You say, embarrassed.

"I think it's time for me to leave, but tomorrow, how about we . . .
121222.title: Showing the digital version of the adventure

choices: A simple game of truth or dare
141.content:
When you get your mother's permission, you leave with Amy. She shows you the different places, like the Library or the pool. You listen closely to her, she was one of your favorite characters after all. When the two of you get to the park, Amy sits down in the grass and smells the flowers. You sit next to her and tell her that she smells better than the flowers. She smiles.

"You're pretty nice. If only Sonic could say those things." She shrugged and looked up at the beautiful sky. You look up as well.

"So I guess we're friends now, right?" You ask. Amy nods. She then asked where you came from. You tell her about the last town, and that your father keeps moving because of work, and how you had to leave your friends and girlfriend. However, you told her you were used to it, because you get to make new friends. "Hopefully we won't have to move again." You say. The two of you listened to the sounds of people having fun, and the birds. "Hey, do you want to play a game?" You ask her.

"Sure, what should we play?" You smile at her.
141.title: Going to the park

info.brief_description: Bringing an interactive I found a couple of years ago back from the grave With a new twist
info.description:
Hello, I'm new to this so I'll keep this short by stating the rules for ya.

Rules: 1. No insulting other races & religions
2. USE PROPER GRAMMAR, No TEXT SLANG
3. I'll allow some toilet humor just no pee or scat(Fart jokes are fine IE: a character uses a whoopee cushion in a prank.) had to change rule 3 a bit for obvious reasons
4. No characters turning evil if they're nice normally (for example: Tails ends up being a jerk and makes you his slave after being nice to you. I don't want that.)
5. I'll let you add in crossovers like if you wanted Coco from Crash bandicoot in this feel free to add her. as long as there's a sonic character in the story line it's fine
6. Don't make an endless chain of other options because that just gets very repetitive, unless it's picking a character, a tickle tool or setting up a story line, don't create a endless next option chain.

New rule: 7. Don't make the main character & a franchise character have sex to fast build a friendship which turns into an actual relationship before that (BI, straight, gay etc. any types fine just run it by me first) I WILL let rouge be an exception to rule 7 'Cause this is rouge we're talking about.

As long as you all fallow rules 1-7 you'll be fine Have fun :) if you have questions go ahead and ask via email

(Don't forget that I'm here to help satisfy your feet related & tickle related needs or anything else that comes to your head)

8/15/2019 update: I'm looking for additions to my interactives! I'll give gp as rewards for the adds, however I do have rules for this:

1. If you do a character choice chapter you'll get 100 gp
2. If you do a story chapter you'l get 500 or 1000+ gp depending on the chapter's length
3. Stick to the guidelines of the interactive you add to
4. Lastly DON't add choice chapters over and over if you think you'll get more gp for it! If someone does so they will only get 100 gp for the FIRST chapter because if they do that it's not fair to others that may want to add to one of the interactives!
info.pretty_title: Feet & Tickle  fun & more w/Sonic & Co.
